'''''lind''''' or '''''lin''''' is an element in [[Quenya]] and [[Sindarin]]. In Quenya it appears sometimes as a contraction of ''[[linde]]'' "air, tune" or "song, music".<ref>{{LR|Etymologies}}</ref><ref>{{S|Appendix}}, ''lin (2)</ref>
==Quenya==
* ''[[Ainulindalë (Rúmil's work)|Ainu'''lind'''alë]]'' = "The Music of the Ainur" (''lindele'' = music)
* ''[[Laurelin|Laure'''lin''']]'' = "Song of Gold"
* ''[[Lindon|'''Lind'''on]]'' = "Land of music"
* '''''lind'''e'' = "singer"<ref>{{WJ|Hurin}}, p. 309</ref>

==Sindarin==
* ''[[Lindir|'''Lind'''ir]]'' = "Song Man"
* ''[[Teiglin|Teig'''lin''']]'' = "Boundary Singer"
==See also==
*''[[lin]]''
